text: Willie Aames (born Albert William Upton 15 July 1960 in Los Angeles, California), is an actor famous for the roles of Buddy Lembeck on Charles in Charge, Tommy Bradford on Eight is Enough and the voice of Hank on Dungeons & Dragons, the cartoon. He also hosted a game show The Krypton Factor from 1990â€“91. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles County, California Category:American child actors Category:American game show hosts Category:American movie actors Category:American movie producers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Movie directors from California Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:Screenwriters from California
title: Willie Aames
